definition: Kangxi radical 61 (心) as a vertical side element
to depend on/to hang on in a place/bad/to renege (on promise)/to disclaim/to rat (on debts)/rascally/to blame/to put the blame on
not to feel like (doing sth)/disinclined to
happy to partake but not prepared to do any work (idiom)/all take and no give
to stretch oneself (on waking or when tired etc)

sentences.english: He flew into a rage, but was still too lazy to work.
sentences.chinese: 他氣壞了，但仍舊好喫懶做。

sentences.english: You don’t want to go encouraging of them. They’re scum.
sentences.chinese: 你不能鼓勵他們好喫懶做，這可是些癟三。

sentences.english: who is the laziest person in your class?
He is a gluttonous and lazy guy.
I just puttered around the house.
Probably, men's uncleanliness is due to their laziness.
sentences.chinese: 男人的髒大概是由於懶。

sentences.english: You two are getting lazier and lazier.
sentences.chinese: 你們兩個變得越來越懶了。

sentences.english: Find the lever of the earth since prize, you can become lazier.
sentences.chinese: 找到撬起地球的槓桿，你就能變得更懶。

sentences.english: Pandas are friendly to people, but they are very shy and kind of lazy.
sentences.chinese: 熊貓對人很友好，但他們很害羞，而且有點懶。

sentences.english: Walking around all wrinkled and creased sends a message of laziness.
sentences.chinese: 穿着皺皺巴巴的衣服，說明你很懶。

sentences.english: He was lazy, disobedient, and wild.
sentences.chinese: 他好喫懶做，是個不聽話的十足野孩子。

sentences.english: But stop and loiter all the time, to sing it in extatic songs.
sentences.chinese: 偶爾懶了遊蕩而已，哼着歌曲說說夢囈。

sentences.english: The teacher gave the lazy boy a good talking-to.
sentences.chinese: 老師把那個懶學生狠狠地批評了一頓。

sentences.english: She's bone-idle. She's even tired of washing her own socks.
sentences.chinese: 她懶透的了，連自己的襪子都不洗。

sentences.english: They come to you when you have meat to offer, but otherwise leave you.
sentences.chinese: 貓纔是好喫懶作，有肉即來，無食即去的東西。

sentences.english: But sometimes I'm afraid I will never meet you.
sentences.chinese: 或許，你不會是我的小懶。

definition: there is nothing to be done/one can't do anything about it
habit/custom/usual practice/to be used to/CL:個|个[ge4]
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
to stop/to cease/to dismiss/to suspend/to quit/to finish
to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
